name: unbusy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not busy or full of activity: I try to do the food shop during the week on an unbusy day. Parents need to find unbusy, unhurried time every week to check in with their kids about school.
More examplesFewer examplesI'm not unbusy, but I'm not overworked either.It was a relatively unbusy afternoon, with only a handful of passengers waiting on the platform.February is a wonderfully unbusy time of the year to visit the city.The route takes you along relatively unbusy country roads.
